mapper.select: select SALES_SER_NAME from SALES_TEMP group by sales_ser_name order by SALES_SER_NAME

select SALES_BUNGI_CODE ,SALES_BD_NAME,SALES_SER_NAME,SALES_STORE_COUNT from SALES_TEMP where SALES_BD_NAME like '%' || #{area2} || '%' and SALES_SER_NAME like '%' || #{detailselectStatus} || '%' order by SALES_BUNGI_CODE
